name: Gener-Cap™ Capsules for Calves
description: Gener-Cap™ Capsules for Calves is a nutritional / microbial supplement for all calves under 500 pounds body weight. Provides high levels of vitamins, chelated trace minerals, live microbials, kelp, specialized egg proteins, fructooligosaccharides and yeast cell walls. Contains a source of live (viable) naturally occurring microorganisms.
